movie.title: Run Lola Run
movie.plot: Lola receives a phone call from her boyfriend Manni. He lost 100,000 DM in a subway train that belongs to a very bad guy. Lola has 20 min to raise this amount and meet Manni. Otherwise, he will rob a store to get the money. Three different alternatives may happen depending on some minor event along Lola's run.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 28 wins & 19 nominations.

events.title: Lola gets to replay her day
